==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|type=22|alt=李下瓜田|lit=under a plum tree or in a melon patch}}

===Etymology===
Originates from a longer phrase {{zh-l|瓜田不納履，李下不正冠}}. It can be compared to the English-language idiom, “caught with one's hand in the cookie jar”.
